stories.text:
There was an article posted to HN within the last 12 months or so I'm trying to remember. Unfortunately I didn't bookmark it so lost it. The title or at least the article content was about the "broken window" theory applied to code. The website has a white background, with a red line at the top. The links at the top are also in red. Overall an aesthetic site.

I believe the articles author is Dutch with a name that starts with a Y.

Can't remember many other details. Hoping someone knows the one I mean.
stories.title: Ask HN: Article with title like “Don't code with broken window?”
